verses.roman:
'sarva-lakṣmī'-śabda pūrve kariyāchi vyākhyāna
sarva-lakṣmī-gaṇera tiṅho hana adhiṣṭhāna

synonyms: sarva-lakṣmī-śabda—the word sarva-lakṣmī; pūrve—previously; kariyāchi—I have done; vyākhyāna—explanation; sarva-lakṣmī-gaṇera—of all the goddesses of fortune; tiṅho—She; hana—is; adhiṣṭhāna—abode.
translation: I have already explained the meaning of "sarva-lakṣmī." Rādhā is the original source of all the goddesses of fortune.
